poem:
Beneath the moon's soft glow,
Whispers of the night flow.
Stars dance in the velvet sky,
As dreams take flight, soaring high.

In solitude's embrace,
Echoes of time and space.
A silent symphony, pure and true,
Whispering secrets old and new.

In the stillness of the lake,
Ripples of memories awake.
Each wave a tale untold,
In the depths of time, they unfold.

In fields of emerald green,
Whispers of spring are seen.
Blossoms bloom and birds sing,
Welcoming the season's bring.

In the chambers of the heart,
Echoes of love never depart.
A symphony of joy and pain,
In every beat, they remain.

In the whispers of the sage,
Wisdom blooms with age.
Words of truth, quiet and deep,
Guiding souls in their sleep.
